item.description:
Join EFactor for an information packed event that will bring social media and marketing professionals to teach you everything you need to know about startup marketing. Learn from a panel of leading experts how to develop and implement an exciting new social media marketing strategy. Network with fellow entrepreneurs and meet marketing professionals to ensure your company’s success!

Join us to discuss:

What are the newest cutting edge Social Media Marketing trends?
How to create the right marketing strategy for your startup
How to build the right marketing team for your company
How to avoid common marketing and social media mistakes

http://www.efactor.com/smmboston

Regular Price - $15 (When you sign up online)

Price at the door - $20

 

Speakers: Shannon Jamieson. Shannon is an attorney and co-founder of New Leaf Legal, a progressive flat-fee law firm specializing in corporate and intellectual property matters, offered exclusively for artists, entrepreneurs and emerging businesses.  Shannon's practice within the firm focuses on a variety of entertainment and IP matters, including acquiring, buying, selling and licensing of copyrights and trademarks, as well as entertainment contracts. Molly DeLong. Molly leads the Real Bullets Branding strategy team with a passion for creating exhilarating branding with a thorough understanding of consumer trends in the digital age. Molly works to create meaningful partnerships for her clients and digital strategies that can translate across multiple channels.  Molly is a Boston native with a degree in Consumer Science and Marketing from University of Wisconsin-Madison.

 

 

First 10 people to arrive will receive iPhone Speck Cases.
item.name: EFactor Presents: Social Media Marketing
